jd_information.description: Job Title :- AM OperationsLocation :- MumbaiC T C :- up to 6.5 L P ARequirements :- Excellent Communication Skills- Must have knowledge of Airlines, GDS, ADMs, PNR creation, Fare Filing, Issuance, Re-issuance & Refunds process work.- Must have the ability to understand flight routing and capability to recommend competitive itineraries & fares.- Must have Team handling experienceIn case interested, Kindly contact us on +91-9759214479 or mail your resume to assuredjob10@gmail.com
